cn.trackName: Solar Arc: Sun and Moon Widget
cn.description:
Plan sun and moon positions before you arrive. Predict golden hour, moonrise, and light direction—plus widgets that keep key times visible at a glance.

Know where the light will be—before you go.

Solar Arc is a sun and moon planning tool built for people who care about timing, direction, and alignment. Instead of guessing or arriving too late, you can predict exactly how light will move across a location—hours or days in advance.

Whether you’re scouting, planning a shoot, or timing a sunset or moonrise, Solar Arc gives you clarity before you commit.

--

Plan with Precision

• Live Sun & Moon Arc Visualization
See real-time solar and lunar paths with compass-based direction.

• Golden Hour & Blue Hour Forecasts
Know the precise windows when light is at its best.

• Moonrise & Moonset Planning
Track lunar timing and position for night and landscape work.

• Forecasting & Location Planning
Preview sun and moon paths for any date, anywhere.

• Offline Access
All core planning tools work without a connection in the field.
cn.trackCensoredName: Solar Arc: Sun and Moon Widget

hk.releaseNotes:
SCANNING

- Better handling of shadows when scanning documents. This results in more readable scans that highlight important information more clearly.

GENIUS CLOUD

- The Offloading feature in Genius Cloud is now opt-in when you log in to your Genius Cloud account. If you feel that your documents are taking up too much disk space, you can activate Offloading at any time. Genius Scan will then offload part of your data to the cloud so you can reclaim storage space on your device.
- The disk space report in Settings now more accurately reflects how much local space Genius Scan uses when Offloading is enabled.

MOBILE DEVICE MANAGMENT

- You can now disable Genius Cloud synchronization via MDM while keeping Genius Cloud accounts available. This makes it easier to enforce organization-wide policies without disrupting users’ access to their accounts.

FIXES

- This release addresses several of some remaining critical but rare crashes, further improving the overall stability of the app. Genius Scan is now more reliable, allowing you to continue working smoothly and without interruptions.

OTHER ENHANCEMENTS

- Banners in the document list now scroll naturally with your documents, use a refreshed color system, and feature new illustrations so important messages stand out more clearly.
hk.description:
Genius Scan 是一款可裝入口袋的掃描器。 可隨時隨地快速掃描文件，並能匯出為JPEG或多頁PDF檔案。

*** Apple App of the Week *** 2000多萬使用者 *** 1000多家小企業 ***

將任何文件放在裝置的相機前面：我們的掃描儀應用程式會自動識別背景紙張，裁剪紙張並清理結果。您可以獲得清晰易讀的掃描。批量掃描可讓您在幾秒鐘內掃描數十頁。強大的工具可幫助您組織、共享或歸檔文件。

“下一次出差時別忘了下載一個Genius Scan，可以給自己和會計部門帶來很大方便。” - AppPicker.com

“相機應用不適合對文字進行近距離掃描，但Genius Scan可以辦到。” - 衛報

==企業版== 

 Genius Scan+ Premium Pack： 

 - 開箱即用（無需升級）Genius Scan+ 的所有高級功能（用下方的 + 表示）。 

管理組態： 

 - 部署到由MDM工具管理的設備中
 - 按使用者預先配置部署應用程式設定（例如，設定預設電子郵件位址，WebDAV / FTP 憑據） 
 - 控制使用者可以將文件匯出到哪些應用程式和服務
 - 無廣告

==主要功能== 

智慧掃描： 

 - 檔案檢測和背景移除
 - 失真校正
 - 陰影去除和缺陷清理
 - 濾鏡（黑白，白板，照片） 
 - 批量掃描

 PDF建立和編輯： 

 - 文件合併和拆分
 - 多頁PDF創建
 - 照片和PDF匯入

安全和隱私： 

 - 裝置上文件處理
 + 面容_ID 
 + PDF密碼加密

文件組織： 

 - 文件標記
 - 元數據和內容搜索
 + 自訂命名方案（智慧文件名稱） 
 + 使用Genius Cloud進行備份和多裝置同步（單獨訂閱） 

匯出：

 - 電子郵件
 + Box, Dropbox, Evernote, Expensify, Google Drive, iCloud Drive, OneDrive, OneNote, FTP, SugarSync, WebDAV. 
 + 任何與WebDAV相容的服務，例如Citrix ShareFile、NextCloud，ownCloud、Synology、Yandex。 
 + 自動後台自動匯出

OCR（文本識別）：

 + 文字提取
 + 創建可搜尋的PDF
 + 掃描名片和建立連絡人

==關於我們== 

The Grizzly Labs在法國巴黎市中心開發了Genius Scan。我們製作能夠説明全世界數百萬使用者的應用程式並在品質和隱私方面保持最高標準，我們為此感到自豪。如果您有任何疑問，請通過@thegrizzlylabs聯繫我們。

==定價和法律==

您可以訂閱Genius Cloud進行備份和同步。在這種情況下，Genius Scan的商店會顯示每個訂閱的持續時間和價格，並在購買時更新。訂單確認後，將從iTunes帳戶中收取付款。除非在當前期間結束前24小時內關閉自動續訂，否則訂閱會自動續訂。管理訂閱，禁用iTunes帳戶設置中的自動續訂。

https://www.thegrizzlylabs.com/genius-scan/cloud/terms

hk.description:
Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action / bullet-hell roguelite where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 130 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with 13 unique characters!

BALANCE RISK & REWARD
Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 13 unique characters!

BECOME OVERPOWERED
Over 130 unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth!

FIND SECRETS
Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villain to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours! Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

hk.releaseNotes:
《漢末霸業》IOS版2.4.4補丁更新公告（V1.1.9.4061）
本次更新的主要內容如下：（1月10日 10:00）
【蒼天之志】番外篇
一、新增內容：
1.新增鍛造功能
 1）工房中可透過消耗材料進行裝備打造，獲得極品裝備；
 2）打造裝備類型包括主武器、副武器和鎧甲三種，每種10個等級；
 3）打造的方式分為普通打造、強化打造、極致打造三種，每種都有成功率，失敗會增加成功率；

2.新增傭兵系統
 1）可在領地--校場中花錢購買傭兵；
 2）傭兵是配好武將、兵力、兵力的部隊，購買後不消耗錢糧，但屬於一次性消耗品，可在任務、關卡中使用；
 3）傭兵每季刷新，玩家最多可以同時購買10支，不需要的傭兵可以刪除；

3.新增第五章全部任務。

4.新增第五章全部關卡。

5.新增玩家私兵多部隊配置功能，最多可以允許玩家配置5支私兵部隊（與官職等級掛鉤），私兵部隊武將可以是玩家武將也可以是麾下武將；

二、優化內容：
1.全面優化多部隊出征功能，關卡和任務中都可以攜帶多部隊出征，攜帶的部隊可以是陣營兵、私兵、傭兵（任務不可使用陣營兵）；
2.調整「廣宗之戰」難度，本方所有部隊不再繼承兵力受損，第二場重新配兵出征，另外增強了劉關張部隊配置；

三、修復錯誤：
1.修復了裝備特效無效果的問題；
2.修復了一些介面問題；
hk.description:
《漢末霸業》要求系統版本為iOS 16以上，並使用iPhone 8或8 Plus、iPhone X及以上、iPad Air 2、iPad mini 4、iPad 2017或任意iPad Pro進行遊戲。

官方微博：
http://weibo.com/longyougame
遊俠網合作論壇：
http://game.ali213.net/forum-1723-1.html
QQ群: 293787531   795489685
Facebook: 搜索 三國誌漢末霸業

【漢末霸業】基本介紹

【三國誌:漢末霸業】是由成都龍遊天下工作室精心制作的壹款回合制君主扮演模式的SLG遊戲。主要是以國人自己對三國遊戲的新思維，新角度來打造不壹樣的三國世界。在回歸傳統策略類的基礎上深度刻畫了三國各城市之間的地域差異以及每個武將自身能力和特性的異同，而在戰鬥方面突出結合天時地利人和的調配來進行作戰的魅力。


正式版遊戲特色：
壹：經典的白描繡像畫風，古樸典雅
人物頭像采用經典的《三國演義》連環畫的白描繡像畫風和上色。遊戲界面采用古風古韻設計，地道中國風。
二：簡單易上手的政務管理模式：
基礎的內政安排、人事探索、軍事偵察、技術開發都采用放置類管理模式，減少繁瑣的重復操作，讓玩家能聚焦其他事件。君主扮演模式，玩家只需要關註首都以及國家的管理。其他城市交給太守進行管理。使用方針給分城下達不同的軍政指令。

三：極其豐富的遊戲內容設定：
	超過1300名登場武將（包括歷史和演義武將）。 
	30項武將基本能力的細分化設計，更能體現武將之間的差異。
	超過300種以上的獨立配置的武將特性，全面凸顯武將個體差異。 
	超過500種有考據的物品寶物設定。多種分類劃分來滿足不同的喜好需求。
	近六十多個不同類型的城市，200多種有據可考的城市特征和特產。
	豐富的技術研究和開發項目，體現了科技對勢力發展的重要性。
	三大基本兵種和近二十種特殊兵種構成豐富的兵種體系。
	超豐富的官職系統。
	各種自然現象和事件災害模擬出多災多難的三國時期。 
	豐富的來訪事情，商人、仙人、名士、名醫、名匠、劍客遊走四方，引發各種功能事件。

四：回歸經典回合制，側重策略性排兵布陣的戰鬥系統
	天氣和地形、地塊高度的引入更加凸顯天時地利要素對戰爭的影響。
	野戰和攻城戰功能獨立分開。攻城有攻城車，霹靂車，井闌，守城有投石機、床弩、塞門刀車。更能凸顯攻守之間的平衡關系。

hk.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

hk.description:
「Cytus II」是雷亞遊戲繼「Cytus」、「Deemo」及「VOEZ」三款全球音樂遊戲排行榜冠軍作品後，由原班人馬傾注全力打造的音樂節奏遊戲續作。


未來，人類重新定義了網路的發展和連線方式，能夠輕易地在現實世界同步存取網路世界，改變了千年以來生活的樣貌。

在巨型精神網路空間cyTus裡，一位來歷不明的傳奇DJ Æsir，其音樂有著讓人為之瘋狂的魅力，每個音符和節拍都能夠深深重擊聽者的靈魂深處。

某日，從未露面的Æsir突然宣布要舉辦第一場大型虛擬音樂祭——Æsir-FEST，邀請了當紅偶像歌手以及人氣DJ作為開場嘉賓。

宣傳公開之際即造成前所未見的討論熱潮，所有人無不想一睹Æsir的真實面貌。

而在音樂祭入場的前一小時，數以千萬計的連線瀏覽次數打破歷史紀錄，整個城市瞬間沸騰了起來，等待Æsir如同天神般的降臨……

遊戲特色：

-獨特動態判定線音樂遊戲玩法
跟隨判定線打擊拍點以獲得高分，透過五種不同特性的拍點及隨節奏動態變化的判定線，讓遊戲過程更貼合音樂，輕鬆融入並沉浸在樂曲之中。

-50首+IAP(額外付費內容)，超越250首最高質量樂曲
本次收錄樂曲涵蓋世界各地如日韓、歐美、台灣等創作者的作品，透過數位角色引領玩家遊玩如電音、搖滾、古典等不同風格之樂曲，是不辜負千萬人期待的自信力作。

-多達800種不同譜面關卡 
設計超過800種由易到難的音樂譜面，豐富的遊戲內容滿足不同等級的玩家，透過指尖的打擊體驗最刺激的挑戰和樂趣。

-與遊戲中的角色們一同進入虛擬的網路世界探險
獨特的故事系統 "iM" 將帶領玩家與遊戲中的角色逐步拼湊出 「Cytus II」背後的劇情脈絡與世界觀，在極富動態的視覺體驗中揭開故事的真實面貌。

PAFF (CV:上坂すみれ)
NEKO (CV:花守ゆみり)
Xenon (CV:関智一)
ConneR (CV:竹内栄治)
Cherry (CV:ファイルーズあい)
Nora (CV:石見舞菜香)
Ivy (CV:河瀬茉希)
Vanessa (CV:楠木ともり)
Rin (CV:能登麻美子)

hk.releaseNotes:
- Made some changes to how the DLC information is fetched from the store to hopefully fix the problem that some users can't purchase the DLCs
- Fixed losing access to DLCs if you start the game with no internet connection
hk.description:
《Way of the Hunter》將推出手機端系列首作，太平洋西北地區的壯美景觀隨之鋪陳眼前。

在美國內茲珀斯谷的廣闊開放世界中，體驗最真實的狩獵與探索。在风景如画的自然栖息地中发现栩栩如生的动物，使用各种细节逼真的武器。

《獵人征途》的野生動物外型真實而美麗，且具備符合現實的動物群體行為特徵，提供玩家全面且真實的狩獵體驗，讓人能完全沉浸在遊戲世界。親眼目睹複雜多樣的生態環境產生的變化，周遭環境會因為你的行動而出現變動及反應。瞭解真正的獵人所代表的意義，並充分運用自己的技能來戰勝考驗。

面對人道狩獵的挑戰、搭配引人入勝的故事情節進行遊戲，或是單純地在這富饒的自然環境中自由狩獵。

* 數十種細節精緻的動物物種與真實的行為模式，為你帶來真正身歷其境的狩獵體驗
* 醒目標示動物跡象、血跡分析，以及能夠倒回觀看子彈鏡頭的射擊回顧畫面，這些功能都能讓您像專業獵人一樣狩獵
* 使用獵人感官將重要詳情和資訊醒目標示出來，或者關閉獵人感官，讓遊戲體驗更具挑戰性
* 複雜的戰利品系統，其會根據身體素質與年齡等多項因素產生獨一無二的鹿角和動物頭角
* 細膩又自然的動物動作，以及動物察覺到玩家存在時的真實反應
* 24 小時的日夜循環，再加上風和天氣的變化
* 真實彈道與子彈物理模擬
* 大量槍枝和裝備選擇，其中包含證照管制裝備，例如：Bushnell、Federal、Leupold、Primos、Remington 和 Steyr Arms
* 遊戲內的經營模式讓玩家可以獵取野味之後，將販賣肉品所得的資金用於購買新裝備、狩獵通行證以及戰利品狩獵台上的標本
* 引人入勝的故事情節，訴說著一段關於家族狩獵事業的掙扎糾葛，以及圍繞其間的競爭關係和友誼
* 直觀的相片模式，讓你可以捕捉並分享自己最愛的瞬間
* 使用手柄或觸控控制追蹤獵物
* 優化手機端操控，兼顧舒適與效率

警告：
不支援記憶體小於 4 GB 的裝置！
您需要至少 6 GB 記憶體的裝置才能使用最高圖形設定。

© www.handy-games.com GmbH

hk.releaseNotes:
《漢末霸業》IOS版2.4.4補丁更新公告（V1.1.9.4061）
本次更新的主要內容如下：（1月10日 10:00）
【蒼天之志】番外篇
一、新增內容：
1.新增鍛造功能
 1）工房中可透過消耗材料進行裝備打造，獲得極品裝備；
 2）打造裝備類型包括主武器、副武器和鎧甲三種，每種10個等級；
 3）打造的方式分為普通打造、強化打造、極致打造三種，每種都有成功率，失敗會增加成功率；

2.新增傭兵系統
 1）可在領地--校場中花錢購買傭兵；
 2）傭兵是配好武將、兵力、兵力的部隊，購買後不消耗錢糧，但屬於一次性消耗品，可在任務、關卡中使用；
 3）傭兵每季刷新，玩家最多可以同時購買10支，不需要的傭兵可以刪除；

3.新增第五章全部任務。

4.新增第五章全部關卡。

5.新增玩家私兵多部隊配置功能，最多可以允許玩家配置5支私兵部隊（與官職等級掛鉤），私兵部隊武將可以是玩家武將也可以是麾下武將；

二、優化內容：
1.全面優化多部隊出征功能，關卡和任務中都可以攜帶多部隊出征，攜帶的部隊可以是陣營兵、私兵、傭兵（任務不可使用陣營兵）；
2.調整「廣宗之戰」難度，本方所有部隊不再繼承兵力受損，第二場重新配兵出征，另外增強了劉關張部隊配置；

三、修復錯誤：
1.修復了裝備特效無效果的問題；
2.修復了一些介面問題；
hk.description:
《漢末霸業》要求系統版本為iOS 16以上，並使用iPhone 8或8 Plus、iPhone X及以上、iPad Air 2、iPad mini 4、iPad 2017或任意iPad Pro進行遊戲。

【漢末霸業】基本介紹

【三國誌:漢末霸業】是由成都龍遊天下工作室精心制作的壹款回合制君主扮演模式的SLG遊戲。主要是以國人自己對三國遊戲的新思維，新角度來打造不壹樣的三國世界。在回歸傳統策略類的基礎上深度刻畫了三國各城市之間的地域差異以及每個武將自身能力和特性的異同，而在戰鬥方面突出結合天時地利人和的調配來進行作戰的魅力。


正式版遊戲特色：
壹：經典的白描繡像畫風，古樸典雅
人物頭像采用經典的《三國演義》連環畫的白描繡像畫風和上色。遊戲界面采用古風古韻設計，地道中國風。
二：簡單易上手的政務管理模式：
基礎的內政安排、人事探索、軍事偵察、技術開發都采用放置類管理模式，減少繁瑣的重復操作，讓玩家能聚焦其他事件。君主扮演模式，玩家只需要關註首都以及國家的管理。其他城市交給太守進行管理。使用方針給分城下達不同的軍政指令。

三：極其豐富的遊戲內容設定：
	超過1300名登場武將（包括歷史和演義武將）。 
	30項武將基本能力的細分化設計，更能體現武將之間的差異。
	超過300種以上的獨立配置的武將特性，全面凸顯武將個體差異。 
	超過500種有考據的物品寶物設定。多種分類劃分來滿足不同的喜好需求。
	近六十多個不同類型的城市，200多種有據可考的城市特征和特產。
	豐富的技術研究和開發項目，體現了科技對勢力發展的重要性。
	三大基本兵種和近二十種特殊兵種構成豐富的兵種體系。
	超豐富的官職系統。
	各種自然現象和事件災害模擬出多災多難的三國時期。 
	豐富的來訪事情，商人、仙人、名士、名醫、名匠、劍客遊走四方，引發各種功能事件。

四：回歸經典回合制，側重策略性排兵布陣的戰鬥系統
	天氣和地形、地塊高度的引入更加凸顯天時地利要素對戰爭的影響。
	野戰和攻城戰功能獨立分開。攻城有攻城車，霹靂車，井闌，守城有投石機、床弩、塞門刀車。更能凸顯攻守之間的平衡關系。

hk.trackCensoredName: Solar Arc: Sun and Moon Widget
hk.trackName: Solar Arc: Sun and Moon Widget
hk.description:
Plan sun and moon positions before you arrive. Predict golden hour, moonrise, and light direction—plus widgets that keep key times visible at a glance.

Know where the light will be—before you go.

Solar Arc is a sun and moon planning tool built for people who care about timing, direction, and alignment. Instead of guessing or arriving too late, you can predict exactly how light will move across a location—hours or days in advance.

Whether you’re scouting, planning a shoot, or timing a sunset or moonrise, Solar Arc gives you clarity before you commit.

--

Plan with Precision

• Live Sun & Moon Arc Visualization
See real-time solar and lunar paths with compass-based direction.

• Golden Hour & Blue Hour Forecasts
Know the precise windows when light is at its best.

• Moonrise & Moonset Planning
Track lunar timing and position for night and landscape work.

• Forecasting & Location Planning
Preview sun and moon paths for any date, anywhere.

• Offline Access
All core planning tools work without a connection in the field.

advisories: 偶爾/輕度使用或提及酒精、煙草或藥物
mo.description:
Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action / bullet-hell roguelite where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 130 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with 13 unique characters!

BALANCE RISK & REWARD
Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 13 unique characters!

BECOME OVERPOWERED
Over 130 unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth!

FIND SECRETS
Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villain to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours! Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

mo.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

- 免費收錄1首來自 Phigros 的樂曲:
Leave All Behind / rider

- 追加曲包 "Phigros", 收錄5首樂曲:
Distorted Fate / Sakuzyo
Igallta / Se-U-Ra
Luminescence / 米虾Fomiki & 初云CLoudie
Rrhar’il / Team Grimoire
The Chariot ~REVIIVAL~ / Attoclef
mo.description:
「Cytus II」是雷亞遊戲繼「Cytus」、「Deemo」及「VOEZ」三款全球音樂遊戲排行榜冠軍作品後，由原班人馬傾注全力打造的音樂節奏遊戲續作。


未來，人類重新定義了網路的發展和連線方式，能夠輕易地在現實世界同步存取網路世界，改變了千年以來生活的樣貌。

在巨型精神網路空間cyTus裡，一位來歷不明的傳奇DJ Æsir，其音樂有著讓人為之瘋狂的魅力，每個音符和節拍都能夠深深重擊聽者的靈魂深處。

某日，從未露面的Æsir突然宣布要舉辦第一場大型虛擬音樂祭——Æsir-FEST，邀請了當紅偶像歌手以及人氣DJ作為開場嘉賓。

宣傳公開之際即造成前所未見的討論熱潮，所有人無不想一睹Æsir的真實面貌。

而在音樂祭入場的前一小時，數以千萬計的連線瀏覽次數打破歷史紀錄，整個城市瞬間沸騰了起來，等待Æsir如同天神般的降臨……

遊戲特色：

-獨特動態判定線音樂遊戲玩法
跟隨判定線打擊拍點以獲得高分，透過五種不同特性的拍點及隨節奏動態變化的判定線，讓遊戲過程更貼合音樂，輕鬆融入並沉浸在樂曲之中。

-50首+IAP(額外付費內容)，超越250首最高質量樂曲
本次收錄樂曲涵蓋世界各地如日韓、歐美、台灣等創作者的作品，透過數位角色引領玩家遊玩如電音、搖滾、古典等不同風格之樂曲，是不辜負千萬人期待的自信力作。

-多達800種不同譜面關卡 
設計超過800種由易到難的音樂譜面，豐富的遊戲內容滿足不同等級的玩家，透過指尖的打擊體驗最刺激的挑戰和樂趣。

-與遊戲中的角色們一同進入虛擬的網路世界探險
獨特的故事系統 "iM" 將帶領玩家與遊戲中的角色逐步拼湊出 「Cytus II」背後的劇情脈絡與世界觀，在極富動態的視覺體驗中揭開故事的真實面貌。

PAFF (CV:上坂すみれ)
NEKO (CV:花守ゆみり)
Xenon (CV:関智一)
ConneR (CV:竹内栄治)
Cherry (CV:ファイルーズあい)
Nora (CV:石見舞菜香)
Ivy (CV:河瀬茉希)
Vanessa (CV:楠木ともり)
Rin (CV:能登麻美子)


*************************************************************
Cytus II 將不定期進行遊戲內購商品的連網認證
若您發現於驗證時間點時，您的裝置未連上網路導致內購商品丟失
請確認將裝置連上網路後，點選"恢復購買紀錄"，即可恢復內購內容
*************************************************************

※ 本遊戲依中華民國遊戲軟體分級管理辦法分類為 : 輔15級。
※ 本遊戲內另提供付費購買項目，請依個人興趣、能力進行購買，請勿過度消費
※ 請注意遊戲時間，避免沉迷。
※ 請勿利用本遊戲進行賭博或其他違反法令行為。
※ 無行為能力人及限制行為能力人必須於法定代理人閱讀、瞭解並同意「雷亞遊戲使用者服務條款」及「雷亞遊戲個人資料暨隱私政策條款」之所有內容後，方得使用本遊戲服務。

mo.trackCensoredName: Way of the Hunter Wild America
mo.releaseNotes:
- Made some changes to how the DLC information is fetched from the store to hopefully fix the problem that some users can't purchase the DLCs
- Fixed losing access to DLCs if you start the game with no internet connection
mo.trackName: Way of the Hunter Wild America
mo.description:
《Way of the Hunter》將推出手機端系列首作，太平洋西北地區的壯美景觀隨之鋪陳眼前。

在美國內茲珀斯谷的廣闊開放世界中，體驗最真實的狩獵與探索。在风景如画的自然栖息地中发现栩栩如生的动物，使用各种细节逼真的武器。

《獵人征途》的野生動物外型真實而美麗，且具備符合現實的動物群體行為特徵，提供玩家全面且真實的狩獵體驗，讓人能完全沉浸在遊戲世界。親眼目睹複雜多樣的生態環境產生的變化，周遭環境會因為你的行動而出現變動及反應。瞭解真正的獵人所代表的意義，並充分運用自己的技能來戰勝考驗。

面對人道狩獵的挑戰、搭配引人入勝的故事情節進行遊戲，或是單純地在這富饒的自然環境中自由狩獵。

* 數十種細節精緻的動物物種與真實的行為模式，為你帶來真正身歷其境的狩獵體驗
* 醒目標示動物跡象、血跡分析，以及能夠倒回觀看子彈鏡頭的射擊回顧畫面，這些功能都能讓您像專業獵人一樣狩獵
* 使用獵人感官將重要詳情和資訊醒目標示出來，或者關閉獵人感官，讓遊戲體驗更具挑戰性
* 複雜的戰利品系統，其會根據身體素質與年齡等多項因素產生獨一無二的鹿角和動物頭角
* 細膩又自然的動物動作，以及動物察覺到玩家存在時的真實反應
* 24 小時的日夜循環，再加上風和天氣的變化
* 真實彈道與子彈物理模擬
* 大量槍枝和裝備選擇，其中包含證照管制裝備，例如：Bushnell、Federal、Leupold、Primos、Remington 和 Steyr Arms
* 遊戲內的經營模式讓玩家可以獵取野味之後，將販賣肉品所得的資金用於購買新裝備、狩獵通行證以及戰利品狩獵台上的標本
* 引人入勝的故事情節，訴說著一段關於家族狩獵事業的掙扎糾葛，以及圍繞其間的競爭關係和友誼
* 直觀的相片模式，讓你可以捕捉並分享自己最愛的瞬間
* 使用手柄或觸控控制追蹤獵物
* 優化手機端操控，兼顧舒適與效率

警告：
不支援記憶體小於 4 GB 的裝置！
您需要至少 6 GB 記憶體的裝置才能使用最高圖形設定。

© www.handy-games.com GmbH

偶爾/輕度的現實生活暴力
mo.releaseNotes:
每日疾病來到 Plague Inc.！利用全新疫情爆發、獨特遊戲機制和強力病原體升級來感染世界。

- 每日疫情爆發：每 24 小時推出全新瘟疫
- 適應並利用獨特的疾病／人類修飾器
- 獲得永久病原體升級，讓你的瘟疫隨著每次勝利更具致命性
- 使用全球排行榜查看你的實際傳染力…
mo.description:
《瘟疫公司》是一個非常真實的策略模擬類游戲。 
您的病原體剛剛感染了“零號病人”。現在您必須適應這個世界，不停改進病原體的傳染力和抵抗力，以便應對人類的反擊措施，最終進化成一個全球性的恐怖瘟疫。
這是為iPhone和iPad設計的全新遊戲，保證將游戲（和您）的標準一同推向更高境界。這是您和全世界的競爭- 唯有強者才能生存！

◈◈◈全球頂尖的手機遊戲◈◈◈ 

《瘟疫公司》是一款極受全球玩家歡迎的策略型遊戲。遊戲獲得近百萬個五星級評價，同時被多家媒體爭相報導，包括經濟學人、紐約每日新聞、衛報、倫敦地鐵和波士頓先驅報等等！
《瘟疫公司》的創辦人更曾獲美國疾病控制預防中心邀請出席在亞特蘭大舉辦的座談會，來分享遊戲內的疾病模型！
 “《瘟疫公司》使用一條非傳統路線來提高公眾對流行病學、疾病傳播和流行疾病信息的意識。”- 美國疾病控制與預防中心
▶ “2012年最佳平板遊戲”- 紐約每日新聞
▶“《瘟疫公司》會在所有方面吸引並保持您的注意力。”- Touch Arcade
▶“《瘟疫公司》的確是一個高質量的遊戲。”- Modojo
▶“《瘟疫公司》真的非常精彩！” London Metro
▶“毀滅全世界的同時又不乏趣味性。”- Pocket Lint
▶“《瘟疫公司》太讓人上癮了！” - Slide to Play
▶ 2012年年度“最佳策略遊戲獎”- Pocket Gamer
▶“殺死幾十億人從未如此有趣過。”- IGN

◈◈◈ 

遊戲特點：
● 出色的Retina顯示與高質量的界面相結合
● 使用超強人工智能技術設計，以更細緻、更真實地模擬現實世界。
● 完整的遊戲功能說明與幫助內容
● 12種病原體，毀滅世界的策略各有不同！ 
● 完整的保存/載入遊戲功能 
● 超過50個國家，上百種性狀和上千種世界事件等您去發掘。
● 完全支持成就係統和排行榜。 
● 更新版本新增了能夠精神上控制人類的Neurax蠕蟲、能夠製造殭屍的Necroa病毒、急速通關模式和多種劇情模式！
● 工作室目前已依次增加了對簡體中文、英語、德語、西班牙語、葡萄牙語、意大利語、法語、日語、韓語和俄語的支持。 （我們還會陸續增加更多語言！）
● 您能拯救世界嗎？現誠邀您在《瘟疫公司》迄今最大規模更新擴展中執掌大權並遏止全球致命流行病！
● 挑戰每日疾病，贏得強效升級，並在疫情模式中與全世界一較高下！

 為了慶祝Plague Inc. (瘟疫公司) 獲得2015年最受歡迎付費應用第五名特別舉辦特價優惠活動！ 

請在Plague Inc. (瘟疫公司) 的Facebook上贊好！
http://www.facebook.com/PlagueInc 
歡迎您關注我們的Twitter

www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations

mo.releaseNotes:
《漢末霸業》IOS版2.4.4補丁更新公告（V1.1.9.4061）
本次更新的主要內容如下：（1月10日 10:00）
【蒼天之志】番外篇
一、新增內容：
1.新增鍛造功能
 1）工房中可透過消耗材料進行裝備打造，獲得極品裝備；
 2）打造裝備類型包括主武器、副武器和鎧甲三種，每種10個等級；
 3）打造的方式分為普通打造、強化打造、極致打造三種，每種都有成功率，失敗會增加成功率；

2.新增傭兵系統
 1）可在領地--校場中花錢購買傭兵；
 2）傭兵是配好武將、兵力、兵力的部隊，購買後不消耗錢糧，但屬於一次性消耗品，可在任務、關卡中使用；
 3）傭兵每季刷新，玩家最多可以同時購買10支，不需要的傭兵可以刪除；

3.新增第五章全部任務。

4.新增第五章全部關卡。

5.新增玩家私兵多部隊配置功能，最多可以允許玩家配置5支私兵部隊（與官職等級掛鉤），私兵部隊武將可以是玩家武將也可以是麾下武將；

二、優化內容：
1.全面優化多部隊出征功能，關卡和任務中都可以攜帶多部隊出征，攜帶的部隊可以是陣營兵、私兵、傭兵（任務不可使用陣營兵）；
2.調整「廣宗之戰」難度，本方所有部隊不再繼承兵力受損，第二場重新配兵出征，另外增強了劉關張部隊配置；

三、修復錯誤：
1.修復了裝備特效無效果的問題；
2.修復了一些介面問題；
mo.description:
《漢末霸業》要求系統版本為iOS 16以上，並使用iPhone 8或8 Plus、iPhone X及以上、iPad Air 2、iPad mini 4、iPad 2017或任意iPad Pro進行遊戲。

官方微博：
http://weibo.com/longyougame
遊俠網合作論壇：
http://game.ali213.net/forum-1723-1.html
QQ群: 293787531   795489685
Facebook: 搜索 三國誌漢末霸業

【漢末霸業】基本介紹

【三國誌:漢末霸業】是由成都龍遊天下工作室精心制作的壹款回合制君主扮演模式的SLG遊戲。主要是以國人自己對三國遊戲的新思維，新角度來打造不壹樣的三國世界。在回歸傳統策略類的基礎上深度刻畫了三國各城市之間的地域差異以及每個武將自身能力和特性的異同，而在戰鬥方面突出結合天時地利人和的調配來進行作戰的魅力。


正式版遊戲特色：
壹：經典的白描繡像畫風，古樸典雅
人物頭像采用經典的《三國演義》連環畫的白描繡像畫風和上色。遊戲界面采用古風古韻設計，地道中國風。
二：簡單易上手的政務管理模式：
基礎的內政安排、人事探索、軍事偵察、技術開發都采用放置類管理模式，減少繁瑣的重復操作，讓玩家能聚焦其他事件。君主扮演模式，玩家只需要關註首都以及國家的管理。其他城市交給太守進行管理。使用方針給分城下達不同的軍政指令。

三：極其豐富的遊戲內容設定：
	超過1300名登場武將（包括歷史和演義武將）。 
	30項武將基本能力的細分化設計，更能體現武將之間的差異。
	超過300種以上的獨立配置的武將特性，全面凸顯武將個體差異。 
	超過500種有考據的物品寶物設定。多種分類劃分來滿足不同的喜好需求。
	近六十多個不同類型的城市，200多種有據可考的城市特征和特產。
	豐富的技術研究和開發項目，體現了科技對勢力發展的重要性。
	三大基本兵種和近二十種特殊兵種構成豐富的兵種體系。
	超豐富的官職系統。
	各種自然現象和事件災害模擬出多災多難的三國時期。 
	豐富的來訪事情，商人、仙人、名士、名醫、名匠、劍客遊走四方，引發各種功能事件。

四：回歸經典回合制，側重策略性排兵布陣的戰鬥系統
	天氣和地形、地塊高度的引入更加凸顯天時地利要素對戰爭的影響。
	野戰和攻城戰功能獨立分開。攻城有攻城車，霹靂車，井闌，守城有投石機、床弩、塞門刀車。更能凸顯攻守之間的平衡關系。

mo.trackName: Solar Arc: Sun and Moon Widget
mo.description:
Plan sun and moon positions before you arrive. Predict golden hour, moonrise, and light direction—plus widgets that keep key times visible at a glance.

Know where the light will be—before you go.

Solar Arc is a sun and moon planning tool built for people who care about timing, direction, and alignment. Instead of guessing or arriving too late, you can predict exactly how light will move across a location—hours or days in advance.

Whether you’re scouting, planning a shoot, or timing a sunset or moonrise, Solar Arc gives you clarity before you commit.

--

Plan with Precision

• Live Sun & Moon Arc Visualization
See real-time solar and lunar paths with compass-based direction.

• Golden Hour & Blue Hour Forecasts
Know the precise windows when light is at its best.

• Moonrise & Moonset Planning
Track lunar timing and position for night and landscape work.

• Forecasting & Location Planning
Preview sun and moon paths for any date, anywhere.

• Offline Access
All core planning tools work without a connection in the field.

tw.description:
Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action / bullet-hell roguelite where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 130 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with 13 unique characters!

BALANCE RISK & REWARD
Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 13 unique characters!

BECOME OVERPOWERED
Over 130 unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth!

FIND SECRETS
Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villain to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours! Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

tw.description:
「Cytus II」是雷亞遊戲繼「Cytus」、「Deemo」及「VOEZ」三款全球音樂遊戲排行榜冠軍作品後，由原班人馬傾注全力打造的音樂節奏遊戲續作。


未來，人類重新定義了網路的發展和連線方式，能夠輕易地在現實世界同步存取網路世界，改變了千年以來生活的樣貌。

在巨型精神網路空間cyTus裡，一位來歷不明的傳奇DJ Æsir，其音樂有著讓人為之瘋狂的魅力，每個音符和節拍都能夠深深重擊聽者的靈魂深處。

某日，從未露面的Æsir突然宣布要舉辦第一場大型虛擬音樂祭——Æsir-FEST，邀請了當紅偶像歌手以及人氣DJ作為開場嘉賓。

宣傳公開之際即造成前所未見的討論熱潮，所有人無不想一睹Æsir的真實面貌。

而在音樂祭入場的前一小時，數以千萬計的連線瀏覽次數打破歷史紀錄，整個城市瞬間沸騰了起來，等待Æsir如同天神般的降臨……

遊戲特色：

-獨特動態判定線音樂遊戲玩法
跟隨判定線打擊拍點以獲得高分，透過五種不同特性的拍點及隨節奏動態變化的判定線，讓遊戲過程更貼合音樂，輕鬆融入並沉浸在樂曲之中。

-50首+IAP(額外付費內容)，超越250首最高質量樂曲
本次收錄樂曲涵蓋世界各地如日韓、歐美、台灣等創作者的作品，透過數位角色引領玩家遊玩如電音、搖滾、古典等不同風格之樂曲，是不辜負千萬人期待的自信力作。

-多達800種不同譜面關卡 
設計超過800種由易到難的音樂譜面，豐富的遊戲內容滿足不同等級的玩家，透過指尖的打擊體驗最刺激的挑戰和樂趣。

-與遊戲中的角色們一同進入虛擬的網路世界探險
獨特的故事系統 "iM" 將帶領玩家與遊戲中的角色逐步拼湊出 「Cytus II」背後的劇情脈絡與世界觀，在極富動態的視覺體驗中揭開故事的真實面貌。

PAFF (CV:上坂すみれ)
NEKO (CV:花守ゆみり)
Xenon (CV:関智一)
ConneR (CV:竹内栄治)
Cherry (CV:ファイルーズあい)
Nora (CV:石見舞菜香)
Ivy (CV:河瀬茉希)
Vanessa (CV:楠木ともり)
Rin (CV:能登麻美子)

tw.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

tw.trackName: Way of the Hunter Wild America
tw.description:
《Way of the Hunter》將推出手機端系列首作，太平洋西北地區的壯美景觀隨之鋪陳眼前。

在美國內茲珀斯谷的廣闊開放世界中，體驗最真實的狩獵與探索。在风景如画的自然栖息地中发现栩栩如生的动物，使用各种细节逼真的武器。

《獵人征途》的野生動物外型真實而美麗，且具備符合現實的動物群體行為特徵，提供玩家全面且真實的狩獵體驗，讓人能完全沉浸在遊戲世界。親眼目睹複雜多樣的生態環境產生的變化，周遭環境會因為你的行動而出現變動及反應。瞭解真正的獵人所代表的意義，並充分運用自己的技能來戰勝考驗。

面對人道狩獵的挑戰、搭配引人入勝的故事情節進行遊戲，或是單純地在這富饒的自然環境中自由狩獵。

* 數十種細節精緻的動物物種與真實的行為模式，為你帶來真正身歷其境的狩獵體驗
* 醒目標示動物跡象、血跡分析，以及能夠倒回觀看子彈鏡頭的射擊回顧畫面，這些功能都能讓您像專業獵人一樣狩獵
* 使用獵人感官將重要詳情和資訊醒目標示出來，或者關閉獵人感官，讓遊戲體驗更具挑戰性
* 複雜的戰利品系統，其會根據身體素質與年齡等多項因素產生獨一無二的鹿角和動物頭角
* 細膩又自然的動物動作，以及動物察覺到玩家存在時的真實反應
* 24 小時的日夜循環，再加上風和天氣的變化
* 真實彈道與子彈物理模擬
* 大量槍枝和裝備選擇，其中包含證照管制裝備，例如：Bushnell、Federal、Leupold、Primos、Remington 和 Steyr Arms
* 遊戲內的經營模式讓玩家可以獵取野味之後，將販賣肉品所得的資金用於購買新裝備、狩獵通行證以及戰利品狩獵台上的標本
* 引人入勝的故事情節，訴說著一段關於家族狩獵事業的掙扎糾葛，以及圍繞其間的競爭關係和友誼
* 直觀的相片模式，讓你可以捕捉並分享自己最愛的瞬間
* 使用手柄或觸控控制追蹤獵物
* 優化手機端操控，兼顧舒適與效率

警告：
不支援記憶體小於 4 GB 的裝置！
您需要至少 6 GB 記憶體的裝置才能使用最高圖形設定。

tw.releaseNotes:
《漢末霸業》IOS版2.4.4補丁更新公告（V1.1.9.4061）
本次更新的主要內容如下：（1月10日 10:00）
【蒼天之志】番外篇
一、新增內容：
1.新增鍛造功能
 1）工房中可透過消耗材料進行裝備打造，獲得極品裝備；
 2）打造裝備類型包括主武器、副武器和鎧甲三種，每種10個等級；
 3）打造的方式分為普通打造、強化打造、極致打造三種，每種都有成功率，失敗會增加成功率；

2.新增傭兵系統
 1）可在領地--校場中花錢購買傭兵；
 2）傭兵是配好武將、兵力、兵力的部隊，購買後不消耗錢糧，但屬於一次性消耗品，可在任務、關卡中使用；
 3）傭兵每季刷新，玩家最多可以同時購買10支，不需要的傭兵可以刪除；

3.新增第五章全部任務。

4.新增第五章全部關卡。

5.新增玩家私兵多部隊配置功能，最多可以允許玩家配置5支私兵部隊（與官職等級掛鉤），私兵部隊武將可以是玩家武將也可以是麾下武將；

二、優化內容：
1.全面優化多部隊出征功能，關卡和任務中都可以攜帶多部隊出征，攜帶的部隊可以是陣營兵、私兵、傭兵（任務不可使用陣營兵）；
2.調整「廣宗之戰」難度，本方所有部隊不再繼承兵力受損，第二場重新配兵出征，另外增強了劉關張部隊配置；

三、修復錯誤：
1.修復了裝備特效無效果的問題；
2.修復了一些介面問題；

QQ群: 293787531   795489685
Facebook: 搜索 三國誌漢末霸業

【漢末霸業】基本介紹

【三國誌:漢末霸業】是由成都龍遊天下工作室精心制作的壹款回合制君主扮演模式的SLG遊戲。主要是以國人自己對三國遊戲的新思維，新角度來打造不壹樣的三國世界。在回歸傳統策略類的基礎上深度刻畫了三國各城市之間的地域差異以及每個武將自身能力和特性的異同，而在戰鬥方面突出結合天時地利人和的調配來進行作戰的魅力。


正式版遊戲特色：
壹：經典的白描繡像畫風，古樸典雅
人物頭像采用經典的《三國演義》連環畫的白描繡像畫風和上色。遊戲界面采用古風古韻設計，地道中國風。
二：簡單易上手的政務管理模式：
基礎的內政安排、人事探索、軍事偵察、技術開發都采用放置類管理模式，減少繁瑣的重復操作，讓玩家能聚焦其他事件。君主扮演模式，玩家只需要關註首都以及國家的管理。其他城市交給太守進行管理。使用方針給分城下達不同的軍政指令。

三：極其豐富的遊戲內容設定：
	超過1300名登場武將（包括歷史和演義武將）。 
	30項武將基本能力的細分化設計，更能體現武將之間的差異。
	超過300種以上的獨立配置的武將特性，全面凸顯武將個體差異。 
	超過500種有考據的物品寶物設定。多種分類劃分來滿足不同的喜好需求。
	近六十多個不同類型的城市，200多種有據可考的城市特征和特產。
	豐富的技術研究和開發項目，體現了科技對勢力發展的重要性。
	三大基本兵種和近二十種特殊兵種構成豐富的兵種體系。
	超豐富的官職系統。
	各種自然現象和事件災害模擬出多災多難的三國時期。 
	豐富的來訪事情，商人、仙人、名士、名醫、名匠、劍客遊走四方，引發各種功能事件。

四：回歸經典回合制，側重策略性排兵布陣的戰鬥系統
	天氣和地形、地塊高度的引入更加凸顯天時地利要素對戰爭的影響。
	野戰和攻城戰功能獨立分開。攻城有攻城車，霹靂車，井闌，守城有投石機、床弩、塞門刀車。更能凸顯攻守之間的平衡關系。

tw.description:
Plan sun and moon positions before you arrive. Predict golden hour, moonrise, and light direction—plus widgets that keep key times visible at a glance.

Know where the light will be—before you go.

Solar Arc is a sun and moon planning tool built for people who care about timing, direction, and alignment. Instead of guessing or arriving too late, you can predict exactly how light will move across a location—hours or days in advance.

Whether you’re scouting, planning a shoot, or timing a sunset or moonrise, Solar Arc gives you clarity before you commit.

--

Plan with Precision

• Live Sun & Moon Arc Visualization
See real-time solar and lunar paths with compass-based direction.

• Golden Hour & Blue Hour Forecasts
Know the precise windows when light is at its best.

• Moonrise & Moonset Planning
Track lunar timing and position for night and landscape work.

• Forecasting & Location Planning
Preview sun and moon paths for any date, anywhere.

• Offline Access
All core planning tools work without a connection in the field.

us.description:
Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action / bullet-hell roguelite where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 130 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with 13 unique characters!

BALANCE RISK & REWARD
Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 13 unique characters!

BECOME OVERPOWERED
Over 130 unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth!

FIND SECRETS
Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villain to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours! Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

us.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月

us.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

us.description:
"Cytus II" is a music rhythm game created by Rayark Games. It's our fourth rhythm game title, following the footsteps of three global successes, "Cytus", "DEEMO" and "VOEZ". This sequel to "Cytus" brings back the original staff and is a product of hardwork and devotion. 

In the future, humans have redefined internet development and connections. We can now easily sync the real world with the internet world, changing life as we have known for thousands of years. 

In the mega virtual internet space cyTus, there exists a mysterious DJ legend Æsir. His music has an irresistible charm; people fall madly in love with his music. Rumor has it that every note and beat of his music hits the audiences in 
the depths of their souls. 

One day, Æsir, who had never shown his face before, suddenly announced that he will be holding the first mega virtual concert —— Æsir-FEST and will invite a top idol singer and a popular DJ as opening performances. The instant the ticket sales began, an unprecedented rush occurred. Everyone wanted to see Æsir's real face. 

On the day of the FEST,  millions of people were connected to the event. At one hour before the event started,  the previous world record for most simultaneous connection was smashed. The whole city was on its feet, waiting for Æsir to descent from the skies...

Game Features:

- The unique "Active Judgement Line" rhythm game playstyle
Tap the notes as the judgement line hits them to achieve a high score. Through five different kinds of notes and the judgement line that actively adjusts its speed according to the beat, the gameplay experience is further combined with the music. Players can easily immerse themselves in the songs. 

- A total of 250+ high-quality songs (50+ in base game, 200+ as IAP)
The game includes songs by composers from all across the world, Japan, Korea, the US, Europe, Taiwan and more. Through the characters, players get to play songs from different genres including but not limited to: electronic, rock and classical. We are confident that this game will live up to the hype and expectations.

- Over 800 different charts
Over 800 different charts designed, from easy to hard. The rich game content can satisfy players of different levels. Experience exciting challenges and enjoyment through the sensation of your fingertips. 

- Explore the virtual internet world with the game's characters
The one-of-a-kind story system "iM" will lead the players and the in-game characters to slowly piece together the story and world behind "Cytus II". Reveal the truth of the story with a rich, cinematic visual experience. 

PAFF (CV:上坂すみれ Sumire Uesaka)
NEKO (CV:花守ゆみり Yumiri Hanamori)
Xenon (CV:関智一 Tomokazu Seki)

us.description:
HUDDLE UP FOR BACKYARD FOOTBALL

Backyard Football 1999 is now enhanced to run on modern systems. Whether you're picking Jerry Rice or Barry Sanders for your dream team, rushing with Pete Wheeler, scoring touchdowns with Pablo Sanchez, or enjoying the witty banter of hosts Sunny Day and Chuck Downfield, simple controls let anyone pick up and play football!

GAME MODES
Single Game: With 5 backyard fields and unique weather condition settings, players can pick their team, design their team logos, and play a pick-up game!
Season Mode: Players can draft seven players from the 30 iconic Backyard Sports characters and a collection of legendary pros including Barry Sanders, Jerry Rice, John Elway, Dan Marino, Randall Cunningham, Drew Bledsoe and Steve Young to compete against 15 other teams in the Backyard Football League. Each team plays a 14-game season. By the end of the regular season, the 4 division champions and 4 wild card teams enter the Backyard Football League Playoffs to compete for the Super Colossal Cereal Bowl!

EARN CLASSIC POWER UPS
Earn power-ups by completing passes on offense and sacking the opposing QB on defense.

Offensive
• Hocus Pocus – A pass play which results in a receiver teleporting down field.
• Sonic Boom – A run play which causes an earthquake to knock over the opposing team.
• Leap Frog – A run play which causes your running back to leap down field.
• Super Punt – A very powerful punt!

Defensive
• Cough Drop – A play that causes the opponent to fumble when tackled.
• Chameleon – A trick play that results in your team wearing the other team's colors for ultimate confusion.
• Spring Loaded – A play that causes your player to leap over the line of scrimmage to sack the QB.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. However, Backyard Football ‘99 runs well, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

STEP UP TO THE PLATE
Relive the second baseball game in the Backyard Sports franchise, now enhanced to run on iOS. Whether you're picking your dream team, playing a pick-up game, or diving into a full season, step up to the plate and experience the game that made baseball fun for everyone!

Backyard Baseball ‘01 teams up the Backyard kids with Backyardified MLB legends. Create your own Backyard team, customize your uniforms, and strategize to win the Championship. Play a single pick-up game or play through an entire season. Backyard Baseball ‘01 features intuitive controls for all ages!

SWING BACK INTO BASEBALL
Enjoy baseball like it’s 2001!
30 Charming Backyard kids
Legendary MLB Players
MLB Team Marks
Hilarious Bloopers
8 Classic Ballparks
9 Pitching Power-ups and 4 batting Power-ups
Lively commentary from Sunny Day and Vinnie

To get into the swing of things, choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit the ball!

THE GOAT RETURNS
Play with the legend himself, Pablo Sanchez. Build a roster from a cast of 30 hilarious child athletes and 28 legendary pros that made Backyard Baseball ‘01 a sports classic. Returning MLB players include Derek Jeter, Alex Rodriguez, Cal Ripken Jr., Sammy Sosa, Mike Piazza, Randy Johnson, Nomar Garciaparra, Jeff Bagwell, Jason Giambi, Chipper Jones, Jeromy Burnitz, Mark McGwire, Shawn Green, Vladimir Guerrero, Kenny Lofton, Jason Kendall, Barry Larkin, Marty Cordova, Mo Vaughn, Raul Mondesi, Curt Schilling, Alex Gonzalez, Juan Gonzalez, Larry Walker, Carlos Beltran, Tony Gwynn, Ivan Rodriguez, and Jose Canseco.

Game Modes include:
Choose from three modes of play (Easy Mode, Medium Mode, Hard Mode)
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer choosing players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You pick your home field, create a team, and manage the team through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season, the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). If you keep winning, you’ll compete in the Super Entire Nation Tournament and Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series!

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. As an example, we can’t use the original 32bit code to support modern macOS, as even with an incredibly clever wrapper, macOS can’t execute the binaries.

Backyard Baseball ‘01 runs well, looks better than ever, includes new bonus features to test your mettle, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

Rediscover the joy of the original Backyard Baseball 1997! Build your roster from the iconic cast of 30 characters stacked with charming personalities and witty banter, and get the edge on the competition with power-ups, fireball pitches, super strength, and Pablo Sanchez!
Play pick-up games, practice batting, and compete in single games or a whole season with simple, intuitive controls that anyone can master!
Game Modes:
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself, and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer to choose players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You create a team and manage it through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). The winner advances to the championship series which consists of the Super Entire Nation Tournament (best of 3) and then the Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series (best of 5)!
Batting Practice: Choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit that ball!
T-ball - Select T-ball mode for more accessible game play. Simply click to hit, run, and field!
 
BACKYARD BASEBALL RULES
The rules for Backyard Baseball are a hybrid of Pro and Little League rules:
No leading off
No Injuries
Bunting is allowed
Tagging up is allowed
Stealing is allowed
 
At our core, we are fans first–not just of video games but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver. Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. Backyard Baseball '97 runs buttery smooth for iOS devices, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the title that started it all.

us.releaseNotes:
The Last Warlord Official Version Patch 2.4.4 Update Notice on iOS（V1.1.9.4061）
The new updates as follow: (1/10 10:00 pm)
I. New Content:
1. Added forging function
   1. Equipment can be crafted in the workshop by consuming materials to obtain top-tier gear.
   2. Craftable equipment types include main weapons, secondary weapons, and armor, each with 10 levels.
   3. Crafting methods are divided into three types: normal crafting, enhanced crafting, and ultimate crafting. Each method has a success rate, and failures will increase the success rate.
2. Added mercenary system
   1. Mercenaries can be purchased with money at the training ground in the territory.
   2. Mercenaries are troops pre-equipped with generals and soldiers. After purchase, they do not consume resources but are one-time consumables, usable in tasks and stages.
   3. Mercenaries are refreshed quarterly. Players can purchase up to 10 mercenaries simultaneously, and unwanted mercenaries can be deleted.
3. Added all tasks for Chapter 5.
4. Added all stages for Chapter 5.
5. Added multi-unit configuration for players' private troops. Players can now configure up to 5 private troop units (dependent on rank), and the generals of these private troops can be either the player’s own generals or their subordinate generals.

II. Optimizations:
1. Comprehensively optimized the multi-unit expedition function. Multiple units can now be deployed in both stages and tasks. Deployable units can include faction troops, private troops, and mercenaries (faction troops are not usable in tasks).
2. Adjusted the difficulty of the "Battle of Guangzong." All friendly troops no longer inherit damage, and troops are reconfigured for the second battle. Additionally, the configurations for the troops of Liu Bei, Guan Yu, and Zhang Fei have been enhanced.

III. Bug Fixes:
1. Fixed an issue where equipment special effects were not working.
2. Fixed various interface issues.
us.description:
Requirements of The Last Warlord:
To ensure the game's normal operation, it is required that iOS version should be higher than iOS Version 16 and use iPhone X or X Plus, iPhone 12 or above, or iPad Air 2, iPad mini 4, iPad 2017 or any iPad Pro to run the game. 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/threekingdomsthelastwarlord
Forum: https://steamcommunity.com/app/577230/discussions/1/

Three Kingdoms: The Last Warlord is a turn-based lord-playing strategy game developed by the Chengdu Longyou Studio. The studio created this game world set in the period of the Three Kingdoms mainly based on people's opinions on other games set in that period. The game is very detailed in depicting the differences between various cities and also the abilities and features of the military officers. The game also applies an appealing battle system in which weather, landforms, and many other factors will influence the result of each battle.
The game is based on the famous Chinese historical novel by Luo Guanzhong (about A.D. 1330 - 1400). 

I. Simple and graceful graphics finished by fine-lined drawing
The portrait of every character in the game is finished by fine-lined drawing with the same style as the picture-story books "Romance of the Three Kingdoms". All interfaces of the game are designed in a typical Chinese style.

II. The governing modes are easy to get started with:
There are easy governing modes in the game so that players can manage various affairs easily and spend more time enjoying its other facets. Due to the game's lord-playing mode, players do not need to pay much attention to cities besides their own capital. Instead, they can order prefects to govern other cities and later on give them commands when necessary.

III. A rich variety of gameplay and contents
Over 1,300 officers are available in the game (including those recorded in historical books and novels).
There are up to 30 attributes for officers.
Over 300 features of officers are available.
Over 500 kinds of verified precious items have been applied to the game world for players of different preferences to choose from.
Over 60 cities of different styles and 200 features of cities are available.
There are also abundant techs research and development items.
Its system of combat units contains three main kinds of combat units and about 20 kinds of special combat units.
Ultra abundant official positions.
Numerous simulated natural phenomena, incidents and disasters will highly represent the calamitous period of the Three Kingdoms.
Travelling around will trigger various incidents. 

IV. The turn-based battle mode requires careful planning in deploying troops
Weather, landforms, and even the height of the battlefield will influence any battles in the game.
There's also a siege mechanism with a great gaming environment. There are various siege vehicles for players to storm castles and also defending their own castles. 

V. Other functions
There are also other functions available in the game.
Cloud Save
Steam Cards
The achievement system allows players to collect and show off achievements.

us.description:
Imagine a magical factory, appearing right in your living room. A carefully planned masterpiece, where diligent workers throw together anything customers want. Rubber ducks and dressers, drones and electric guitars, scooters and other wonderful goods can be created from many different materials and sold for hard cash – cash you invest right back into your factory to get more machines, more workers and grow your business. In Little Big Workshop you become a factory tycoon!

Real factories - made FUN
You are the Big Boss and it’s time to take charge of your very own tabletop factory. Organize the factory floor, manage your workers, purchase machinery, and design efficient production lines - all within the time-limit and to your client's satisfaction! 

An open-ended sandbox-experience
Take it easy, it’s a sandbox-experience where you think, ponder and poke at things until you get it to work the way you’d like. Supply products to clients and an ever-changing market, as you produce over 50 unique product types, built from multiple parts and pieces - all of which can be created with different materials and production methods. No two factories should ever look the same.

Tiny hands, big dreams
Start out with just a small workshop and expand to a desk-filling factory. Unlock ever fancier machines, add even more production methods, and most of all, more room. Soon enough you’ll be running multiple production lines, producing hundreds of advanced products each day, and watching with joy as your cute workers do the actual work.

Features:
- Varying industries and a wide range of products
- Focus on practical problems, not on values, economics, or logistics
- Organize all steps of the production on a blueprint
- Factories grow as you unlock more desk space
- Fully simulated Day/Night-cycle
- Take care of your workers! Work them too hard and they drop like flies
- Cute model-town art-style

us.description:
You don’t need to paint to create beautiful watercolor images—Waterlogue captures the essence of your photos in brilliant, liquid color. See the world like an artist.


FEATURES:

• Waterlogue transforms your photos into luminous watercolors
• Watch Waterlogue paint as it transforms your images
• Use your watercolors to create an artist’s journal or notebook
• Save your watercolors and share via Instagram, Facebook, Bluesky, Mastodon, Message, Email, and more
• Create beautiful, high-res, frameable art for your home
• 14 pre-set styles to customize your watercolors by controlling wetness, pen outlines, and color
• Image export at high resolution
• Control of borders, lightness, and detail
• Includes example images
• Awarded "App Store Best of 2014" by Apple

tr.description:
Lawgivers II is a political sandbox game that features multiple electoral systems, approve/reject bills and govern a country. Start out your career from the very bottom, and perhaps one day, lead your nation to become the most influential in the world.

◉ Discover diverse political systems across dozens of countries, ranging from first-past-the-post to proportional d’Hondt representation.
◉ Control a politician within a party and choose to play for national prestige, party influence, or personal gain.
◉ Propose, debate, and vote on bills in the plenary that impact the economy, happiness, and global stability.
◉ Forge ties with organizations, negotiate deals with other parties, or unite in a coalition.
◉ Make use of corruption and other shady activities to raise black money or to pass controversial laws in Parliament or Congress.
◉ No ads. No microtransactions. A complete experience. One purchase — endless replayability.

tr.description:
Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action / bullet-hell roguelite where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 130 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with 13 unique characters!

BALANCE RISK & REWARD
Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 13 unique characters!

BECOME OVERPOWERED
Over 130 unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth!

FIND SECRETS
Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villain to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours! Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

tr.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

tr.description:
"Cytus II" is a music rhythm game created by Rayark Games. It's our fourth rhythm game title, following the footsteps of three global successes, "Cytus", "DEEMO" and "VOEZ". This sequel to "Cytus" brings back the original staff and is a product of hardwork and devotion. 

In the future, humans have redefined internet development and connections. We can now easily sync the real world with the internet world, changing life as we have known for thousands of years. 

In the mega virtual internet space cyTus, there exists a mysterious DJ legend Æsir. His music has an irresistible charm; people fall madly in love with his music. Rumor has it that every note and beat of his music hits the audiences in 
the depths of their souls. 

One day, Æsir, who had never shown his face before, suddenly announced that he will be holding the first mega virtual concert —— Æsir-FEST and will invite a top idol singer and a popular DJ as opening performances. The instant the ticket sales began, an unprecedented rush occurred. Everyone wanted to see Æsir's real face. 

On the day of the FEST,  millions of people were connected to the event. At one hour before the event started,  the previous world record for most simultaneous connection was smashed. The whole city was on its feet, waiting for Æsir to descent from the skies...

Game Features:

- The unique "Active Judgement Line" rhythm game playstyle
Tap the notes as the judgement line hits them to achieve a high score. Through five different kinds of notes and the judgement line that actively adjusts its speed according to the beat, the gameplay experience is further combined with the music. Players can easily immerse themselves in the songs. 

- A total of 250+ high-quality songs (50+ in base game, 200+ as IAP)
The game includes songs by composers from all across the world, Japan, Korea, the US, Europe, Taiwan and more. Through the characters, players get to play songs from different genres including but not limited to: electronic, rock and classical. We are confident that this game will live up to the hype and expectations.

- Over 800 different charts
Over 800 different charts designed, from easy to hard. The rich game content can satisfy players of different levels. Experience exciting challenges and enjoyment through the sensation of your fingertips. 

- Explore the virtual internet world with the game's characters
The one-of-a-kind story system "iM" will lead the players and the in-game characters to slowly piece together the story and world behind "Cytus II". Reveal the truth of the story with a rich, cinematic visual experience. 

PAFF (CV:上坂すみれ Sumire Uesaka)
NEKO (CV:花守ゆみり Yumiri Hanamori)
Xenon (CV:関智一 Tomokazu Seki)
ConneR (CV:竹内栄治 Eiji Takeuchi)
Cherry (CV:ファイルーズあい Fairouz Ai)
Nora (CV:石見舞菜香 Manaka Iwami)
Ivy (CV:河瀬茉希 Maki Kawase)
Vanessa (CV:楠木ともり Tomori Kusunoki)
Rin (CV:能登麻美子 Mamiko Noto)

*************************************************************
Cytus II will perform a connection authentication for its In-app purchases from time to time.
If you discover during the authentication period that your IAP was lost due to your device not connecting to the internet, 
please make sure your device is connected to the internet. Afterwards, click "Restore Purchases" to recover your IAP.
*************************************************************
※ This game contains mild violence and vulgar language. Suitable for users age 15 and above.
※ This game contains additional in-app purchases. Please purchased base on personal interest and ability. Do not overspend.
※ Please pay attention to your game time and avoid addiction.
※ Please do not use this game for gambling or other illegal purposes.

tr.trackName: Way of the Hunter Wild America
tr.description:
Enjoy the first entry of the Way of the Hunter mobile series set in the beautiful North American Pacific Northwest.

This authentic hunting experience lets you explore and hunt in large open-world environments in the Nez Perce Valleys, USA. Discover true-to-life animals in beautiful natural habitats and handle various detailed and highly realistic weapons.

Way of the Hunter provides a highly immersive, completely integrated experience amongst stunning wildlife with true-to-live animal group behavior. Witness the changing of complex ecosystems that react and adapt to your input. Learn what it means to be a true hunter and put your skills to the test.

Face the challenges of ethical hunting, supported by a compelling story, or simply enjoy hunting in rich environments freely.

* Dozens of strikingly detailed animal species with realistic behavior models for a genuinely immersive hunting experience
* Hunt like a pro with features that highlight animal signs, blood splatter analysis, and shot review with the rewindable bullet camera
* Use Hunter Sense to highlight important details and information or deactivate it
* Complex Trophy system generates unique antlers and horns based on multiple factors like fitness and age
* Sophisticated natural animal animations and reactions when sensing the player's presence
* 24-hour day/night cycle with changing wind and weather
* Realistic ballistics and bullet physics simulation
* A broad selection of firearms and equipment, including licensed gear from Bushnell, Federal, Leupold, Primos, Remington, and Steyr Arms
* An in-game economy that lets you hunt game and sell the meat to purchase new gear, hunting passes, and taxidermy for your trophy stands
* A compelling story about the struggles of a family hunting business and the rivalry and friendships that surround it
* Intuitive photo mode for capturing and sharing your favorite moments
* Stalk your prey with a gamepad or touch controls
* Optimized mobile controls for comfort and efficiency

WARNING:
Devices with less than 4 GB of RAM are not supported!
You need a device with at least 6 GB of RAM to use the highest graphics settings.

Imprint: http://www.handy-games.com/contact/

© www.handy-games.com GmbH

tr.releaseNotes:
The Last Warlord Official Version Patch 2.4.4 Update Notice on iOS（V1.1.9.4061）
The new updates as follow: (1/10 10:00 pm)
I. New Content:
1. Added forging function
   1. Equipment can be crafted in the workshop by consuming materials to obtain top-tier gear.
   2. Craftable equipment types include main weapons, secondary weapons, and armor, each with 10 levels.
   3. Crafting methods are divided into three types: normal crafting, enhanced crafting, and ultimate crafting. Each method has a success rate, and failures will increase the success rate.
2. Added mercenary system
   1. Mercenaries can be purchased with money at the training ground in the territory.
   2. Mercenaries are troops pre-equipped with generals and soldiers. After purchase, they do not consume resources but are one-time consumables, usable in tasks and stages.
   3. Mercenaries are refreshed quarterly. Players can purchase up to 10 mercenaries simultaneously, and unwanted mercenaries can be deleted.
3. Added all tasks for Chapter 5.
4. Added all stages for Chapter 5.
5. Added multi-unit configuration for players' private troops. Players can now configure up to 5 private troop units (dependent on rank), and the generals of these private troops can be either the player’s own generals or their subordinate generals.

II. Optimizations:
1. Comprehensively optimized the multi-unit expedition function. Multiple units can now be deployed in both stages and tasks. Deployable units can include faction troops, private troops, and mercenaries (faction troops are not usable in tasks).
2. Adjusted the difficulty of the "Battle of Guangzong." All friendly troops no longer inherit damage, and troops are reconfigured for the second battle. Additionally, the configurations for the troops of Liu Bei, Guan Yu, and Zhang Fei have been enhanced.

III. Bug Fixes:
1. Fixed an issue where equipment special effects were not working.
2. Fixed various interface issues.
tr.description:
Requirements of The Last Warlord:
To ensure the game's normal operation, it is required that iOS version should be higher than iOS Version 16 and use iPhone X or X Plus, iPhone 12 or above, or iPad Air 2, iPad mini 4, iPad 2017 or any iPad Pro to run the game. 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/threekingdomsthelastwarlord
Forum: https://steamcommunity.com/app/577230/discussions/1/

Three Kingdoms: The Last Warlord is a turn-based lord-playing strategy game developed by the Chengdu Longyou Studio. The studio created this game world set in the period of the Three Kingdoms mainly based on people's opinions on other games set in that period. The game is very detailed in depicting the differences between various cities and also the abilities and features of the military officers. The game also applies an appealing battle system in which weather, landforms, and many other factors will influence the result of each battle.
The game is based on the famous Chinese historical novel by Luo Guanzhong (about A.D. 1330 - 1400). 

I. Simple and graceful graphics finished by fine-lined drawing
The portrait of every character in the game is finished by fine-lined drawing with the same style as the picture-story books "Romance of the Three Kingdoms". All interfaces of the game are designed in a typical Chinese style.

II. The governing modes are easy to get started with:
There are easy governing modes in the game so that players can manage various affairs easily and spend more time enjoying its other facets. Due to the game's lord-playing mode, players do not need to pay much attention to cities besides their own capital. Instead, they can order prefects to govern other cities and later on give them commands when necessary.

III. A rich variety of gameplay and contents
Over 1,300 officers are available in the game (including those recorded in historical books and novels).
There are up to 30 attributes for officers.
Over 300 features of officers are available.
Over 500 kinds of verified precious items have been applied to the game world for players of different preferences to choose from.
Over 60 cities of different styles and 200 features of cities are available.
There are also abundant techs research and development items.
Its system of combat units contains three main kinds of combat units and about 20 kinds of special combat units.
Ultra abundant official positions.
Numerous simulated natural phenomena, incidents and disasters will highly represent the calamitous period of the Three Kingdoms.
Travelling around will trigger various incidents. 

IV. The turn-based battle mode requires careful planning in deploying troops
Weather, landforms, and even the height of the battlefield will influence any battles in the game.
There's also a siege mechanism with a great gaming environment. There are various siege vehicles for players to storm castles and also defending their own castles. 

V. Other functions
There are also other functions available in the game.
Cloud Save
Steam Cards
The achievement system allows players to collect and show off achievements.

tr.description:
Imagine a magical factory, appearing right in your living room. A carefully planned masterpiece, where diligent workers throw together anything customers want. Rubber ducks and dressers, drones and electric guitars, scooters and other wonderful goods can be created from many different materials and sold for hard cash – cash you invest right back into your factory to get more machines, more workers and grow your business. In Little Big Workshop you become a factory tycoon!

Real factories - made FUN
You are the Big Boss and it’s time to take charge of your very own tabletop factory. Organize the factory floor, manage your workers, purchase machinery, and design efficient production lines - all within the time-limit and to your client's satisfaction! 

An open-ended sandbox-experience
Take it easy, it’s a sandbox-experience where you think, ponder and poke at things until you get it to work the way you’d like. Supply products to clients and an ever-changing market, as you produce over 50 unique product types, built from multiple parts and pieces - all of which can be created with different materials and production methods. No two factories should ever look the same.

Tiny hands, big dreams
Start out with just a small workshop and expand to a desk-filling factory. Unlock ever fancier machines, add even more production methods, and most of all, more room. Soon enough you’ll be running multiple production lines, producing hundreds of advanced products each day, and watching with joy as your cute workers do the actual work.

Features:
- Varying industries and a wide range of products
- Focus on practical problems, not on values, economics, or logistics
- Organize all steps of the production on a blueprint
- Factories grow as you unlock more desk space
- Fully simulated Day/Night-cycle
- Take care of your workers! Work them too hard and they drop like flies
- Cute model-town art-style

pt.releaseNotes:
SCANNING

- Better handling of shadows when scanning documents. This results in more readable scans that highlight important information more clearly.

GENIUS CLOUD

- The Offloading feature in Genius Cloud is now opt-in when you log in to your Genius Cloud account. If you feel that your documents are taking up too much disk space, you can activate Offloading at any time. Genius Scan will then offload part of your data to the cloud so you can reclaim storage space on your device.
- The disk space report in Settings now more accurately reflects how much local space Genius Scan uses when Offloading is enabled.

MOBILE DEVICE MANAGMENT

- You can now disable Genius Cloud synchronization via MDM while keeping Genius Cloud accounts available. This makes it easier to enforce organization-wide policies without disrupting users’ access to their accounts.

FIXES

- This release addresses several of some remaining critical but rare crashes, further improving the overall stability of the app. Genius Scan is now more reliable, allowing you to continue working smoothly and without interruptions.

OTHER ENHANCEMENTS

- Banners in the document list now scroll naturally with your documents, use a refreshed color system, and feature new illustrations so important messages stand out more clearly.
pt.description:
O Genius Scan é um scanner de bolso. Digitalize rapidamente seus documentos em qualquer lugar e exporte-os como arquivos JPEG ou PDF de várias páginas.

*** Apple App of the Week *** mais de 20 milhões de usuários *** milhares de pequenas empresas ***

Posicione qualquer documento em frente à câmera do seu dispositivo: nosso aplicativo digitalizador reconhecerá o papel contra o fundo, cortará sua imagem e limpará o resultado. Você obterá uma digitalização nítida e legível. A digitalização em lote permite que você digitalize dezenas de páginas em apenas alguns segundos. Ferramentas poderosas ajudam a organizar, compartilhar ou arquivar seus documentos.

"Na próxima vez que você planejar viajar, não se esqueça de baixar uma cópia do Genius Scan para facilitar sua vida e a do departamento de contabilidade." - AppPicker.com

"Os aplicativos de câmera não foram projetados para digitalizar textos de perto, mas o Genius Scan sim." - The Guardian

== ENTERPRISE EDITION ==

Pacote Genius Scan+ Premium:

- Todos os recursos premium do Genius Scan+ (indicados com + abaixo), prontos para usar (sem necessidade de atualização).

Configuração gerenciada:

- Implantação em frotas de dispositivos por uma ferramenta MDM
- Definição prévia das configurações do aplicativo por usuário (por exemplo, definir endereço de email padrão, credenciais de WebDAV/FTP)
- Controle de quais aplicativos e serviços para os quais os usuários podem exportar documentos
- Sem anúncios

== PRINCIPAIS RECURSOS == 

Digitalização inteligente:

- Detecção de documento e remoção de fundo
- Correção de distorções
- Remoção de sombras e limpeza de imperfeição
- Filtros (preto e branco, quadro branco, foto)
- Digitalização em lote

Criação e edição de PDF:

- Mescla e divisão de documentos
- Criação de PDF multipáginas
- Importação de fotos e PDF

Segurança e privacidade:

- Processamento de documentos no dispositivo
+ Face ID
+ Criptografia de senha no PDF

Organização de documentos:

- Identificação de documentos
- Pesquisa de metadados e conteúdo
+ Esquemas personalizados de nomenclatura (Smart Document Names)
+ Backup e sincronização multidispositivos da Genius Cloud (assinatura em separado)

Exporta:

- Email
+ Box, Dropbox, Evernote, Expensify, Google Drive, iCloud Drive, OneDrive, OneNote, FTP, SugarSync, WebDAV.
+ Qualquer serviço compatível com WebDAV, como Citrix ShareFile, NextCloud, ownCloud, Synology, Yandex. 
+ Exportação automática de fundo

OCR (Reconhecimento de texto):

+ Extração de texto
+ Criação de PDFs pesquisáveis
+ Leitura de cartões de visita e criação de contatos

== QUEM SOMOS ==

É no coração de Paris, na França, que The Grizzly Labs desenvolve o Genius Scan. Nos orgulhamos por criarmos aplicativos que ajudam milhões de usuários em todo o mundo, e que nos colocam nos mais altos padrões de qualidade e privacidade. Entre em contato conosco @thegrizzlylabs se tiver alguma dúvida.

== PREÇOS E LEGAIS ==

Você pode se inscrever no Genius Cloud para backup e sincronização. Nesse caso, a loja da Genius Scan exibe a duração e o preço de cada assinatura, atualizados no momento da compra. O pagamento será cobrado na conta do iTunes quando o pedido for confirmado. As assinaturas são renovadas automaticamente, a menos que a renovação automática seja desativada até 24 horas antes do final do período atual. Gerenciar assinaturas, desative a renovação automática nas configurações da conta do iTunes.

https://www.thegrizzlylabs.com/genius-scan/cloud/terms

In the future, humans have redefined internet development and connections. We can now easily sync the real world with the internet world, changing life as we have known for thousands of years. 

In the mega virtual internet space cyTus, there exists a mysterious DJ legend Æsir. His music has an irresistible charm; people fall madly in love with his music. Rumor has it that every note and beat of his music hits the audiences in 
the depths of their souls. 

One day, Æsir, who had never shown his face before, suddenly announced that he will be holding the first mega virtual concert —— Æsir-FEST and will invite a top idol singer and a popular DJ as opening performances. The instant the ticket sales began, an unprecedented rush occurred. Everyone wanted to see Æsir's real face. 

On the day of the FEST,  millions of people were connected to the event. At one hour before the event started,  the previous world record for most simultaneous connection was smashed. The whole city was on its feet, waiting for Æsir to descent from the skies...

Game Features:

- The unique "Active Judgement Line" rhythm game playstyle
Tap the notes as the judgement line hits them to achieve a high score. Through five different kinds of notes and the judgement line that actively adjusts its speed according to the beat, the gameplay experience is further combined with the music. Players can easily immerse themselves in the songs. 

- A total of 250+ high-quality songs (50+ in base game, 200+ as IAP)
The game includes songs by composers from all across the world, Japan, Korea, the US, Europe, Taiwan and more. Through the characters, players get to play songs from different genres including but not limited to: electronic, rock and classical. We are confident that this game will live up to the hype and expectations.

- Over 800 different charts
Over 800 different charts designed, from easy to hard. The rich game content can satisfy players of different levels. Experience exciting challenges and enjoyment through the sensation of your fingertips. 

- Explore the virtual internet world with the game's characters
The one-of-a-kind story system "iM" will lead the players and the in-game characters to slowly piece together the story and world behind "Cytus II". Reveal the truth of the story with a rich, cinematic visual experience.
